name: Magical Interior Style: Hobbit inspired living rooms, kitchens, bathrooms and more
description:
What can I create with this?

Hobbit house-inspired interiors, with large windows, nice views, luxury furniture, and dark wood and leather material.

Quick Example

Positive prompt

(Professional 3D rendering:1.3) of (Ultrarealistic:1.3) magicalinterior style, bathroom, bathing room, plant, scenery, window, tree, nature, bathtub, forest, mirror, bath, faucet, water, house interior, indoors, cottage interior, treehouse interior, dark, gothic, Goth, luxury, fantasy, magic, Harry Potter, Slytherin, perfect composition, award-winning,CGSociety,ArtStation

Negative prompt

ng_deepnegative_v1_75t, bad-artist, (worst quality, low quality:1.4), multiple views, multiple panels, blurry, watermark, letterbox, text, character, human, people, 1girl, 1boy,((Wireframe)),Polygons,Screenshot,Character design,Software,UI,watermark,signature

Example Settings

768x512 px canvas size, CFG scale 7 and 70 steps on Deliberate.

Complete workflow

Prompt structure

[your medium], magicalinterior style, [Subject], [Descriptors]

Medium

You can use "professional 3d rendering" or set Image Type to Random in StylePile (highly recommended extension).

Subject

Use one of these subjects or copy-paste them to the [X] field of Style Pile and use [X] in your prompt formula instead of [Subject]. You can also generate your original subjects in ChatGTP, using the workflow described here.

kitchen, kitchen decor, kitchen design, window, scenery, plant, table, bottle, sunlight, chair

bathroom, bathing room, plant, scenery, window, tree, nature, bathtub, forest, mirror, bath, faucet, water

living room, livingroom, plant, candle, window, scenery, couch, table, candlestand, cup, potted plant, teapot, sleeping, chair, stained glass

potions lair, candle, city, scenery, window, fantasy, witchcraft, alchemy, alchemist lab, candlestand, bottle, chandelier, table, shelf

library, no scenery, books, bookshelf, window, plant, tree, lamp, table, candle, flower, chair

Descriptors

The last part of the positive prompt is descriptive tags. Use one of these or make your own:

house interior, indoors, cottage interior, treehouse interior, dark, gothic, Goth, luxury, fantasy, magic, Harry Potter, Slytherin, Lord of the rings, LOTR

house interior, indoors, cottage interior, treehouse interior, light, bright, luxury, fantasy, magic, Harry Potter, Slytherin, perfect composition, award-winning

house interior, indoors, cottage interior, treehouse interior, dark, gothic, Goth, luxury, fantasy, magic, Harry Potter, Slytherin, perfect composition, award-winning, Dirk Crabeth, unreal engine 5 highly rendered, a detailed matte painting, gothic art

Negative prompt

Use two of your favorite negative embeddings (in my case Deep Negative and Bad Artist) plus negative words from the model you are using. My case:

ng_deepnegative_v1_75t, bad-artist, (worst quality, low quality:1.4), multiple views, multiple panels, blurry, watermark, letterbox, text, character, human, people, 1girl, 1boy

Recommended models

Good results on Deliberate, The Allys Mix III, and Surreal Steampunk AI (without trigger words). Style fails to deliver with Anime models, such as Grapefruit.

Upscaling

Examples are not upscaled but you can do it with a denoising of 0.2 and your favorite upscaler in IMG2IMG.

modelVersions.description: Trained with 55 high-quality Midjourney images with variable speed (0.05:100, 0.02:200, 0.01:600, 0.005:2000, 0.002:5000, 0.001:10000, 0.0005) up to 40 000 steps.
